programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.desc: Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Peabody & Sherman's first show goes off the rails when celebrity-seeking neighbors won't leave; Napoleon throws a temper tantrum to get his own dessert.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Fang Decay Why is Thatch acting meaner than usual? He has a fang-ache! Scare Day Mantha is determined to become the first zombie ever to win the Super Boo?Scare School's ultimate scaring competition.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.desc: Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippet’s Race Cadets. programme.desc: Tony hits an unexpected roadblock at his Indian River claim. Rick searches for a new spot to mine. Parker's crew makes a big move in the Long Cut.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen (S1)
programme.desc: Jared moves into an abandoned logging camp, placing a $250,000 bet on a remote, dangerous site that will either sink or save his business.

programme.title: Gold Rush_Specials (S15)
programme.desc: The future of Tony Beets' dynasty hangs in the balance as the kids jockey for position to see who will take over the family business.

programme.title: Mystery At Blind Frog Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: Duane and James visit Mexico to meet with an expert after drilling an Aztec aqueduct, while Chad and Josh trace the waterway to a remote lake.

programme.title: Inside Out (S1)
programme.desc: Mike pitches his grandest idea ever to a client looking to convert their garage into a primary bedroom.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters (S7)
programme.desc: Drowning in a sea of overburden, The Blacklighters face off against each other as Mark’s inexperience with the dozer proves too much for Paul.

programme.title: Restoration Road With Clint Harp (S1)
programme.desc: Chip heads to a derelict grain mill built in 1950 in the small town of Utica, Ohio, and painstakingly restores it into an upscale wedding and lodging venue.

programme.title: Super Dad (S2)
programme.desc: Two brothers have always been close and want their kids to share the same relationship. They call on Taylor to build a ropes course with a long slide.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhang’s custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: The team scores a major deal when Dolmar is offered a low-price on a home in a desirable neighbourhood in South Tampa. After some debate, the decision is made to turn the home into a long-term rental.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S16)
programme.desc: Contestants arrive as the Frankston foreshore where the judges unveil 12 team-coloured aprons – today will be a service challenge! In two teams, contestants are tasked with elevating traditional pub food.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Pheasant is a popular type of poultry commonly used in Tuscany. Rachael demonstrates how to cook pheasant in a ragu sauce served over a bed of pappardelle pasta.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: Breakfast may be the most important meal of the day, but that doesn't mean we can't reinvent it to create an amazing and more delicious meal. Chefs show off their culinary skills with unexpected twists.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two restaurants whose breakfast offerings bring them to legendary status. First, Buddy's off to the Pancake Pantry whose pancake recipe is top secret, their current owner doesn't even know it!

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Seafood may not be your first thought when you think of a city like Detroit, Michigan, but at the Belgian-inspired Cadieux Cafe, Buddy tries the best bowl of steamed mussels and braised Belgian rabbit.

programme.title: Best In Chow
programme.desc: Host Matt Richards goes to the French Quarter in New Orleans, Louisiana to find the best brunch, wild card, and po boy dishes.

programme.title: Best In Chow
programme.desc: Deep Ellum in Dallas, TX is the live music capital of North Texas, but it's also known for having the best late night munchies and brunches around to keep the foodies energised and coming back for more.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Twenty-four contestants return for another shot at the trophy. Culinary legend Gordon Ramsay greets them to announce that they are splitting into three teams and taking on a service challenge.

programme.title: The Venice Murders
programme.desc: Leaving her career behind, Celia follows her passion to Italy but faces crisis when her roommate vanishes. Alone, she joins eccentric Aunt Rosato to rescue her friend and unmask the abductor.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1)
programme.desc: The founding fathers of the biggest retail stores in the world battle to be the first to innovate, build, and revolutionise the industry. And Sam Walton will construct the world's largest retail empire.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S23)

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: In the Bible, there are two Arks, each designed by God himself. Both the Ark of the Covenant and Noah's Ark were built to protect but lost to history. Did either exist, and if so, where could they be?

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: As the survivalists struggle to find their footing, signs of winter's onslaught motivates them to put their plans into action. Some claim their first victories, while one participant grapples an issue.

programme.desc: When a Les Paul original, a 1952 Telecaster Fender and a bass guitar singed by rock legends struts into the shop, will the guys be strung along and fine tune an offer or fret and miss out?

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: The units are packed full in Stanton, as Darrell has to deal with Kimber's eyes on a competitor. Ivy brings a full truck, hoping for a second haul. Dusty unpacks what could be the ultimate assistant.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: A former farming community east of Tokyo is soon to disappear due to an expansion project at Narita International Airport. Saito Koyata has been taking photos there to record local people's lives.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #39 I lost my wallet. / To explain that you did something you didn't intend to, use the "te" form of a verb, and add "shite shimaimashita." So, "otosu" (to drop) becomes "otoshite shimaimashita."

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: BIZ STREAM
programme.desc: This episode introduces two aquaculture companies that have turned to new types of fish to overcome challenges in their quest for sustainable seafood production.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: On this episode, we revisit Filipino dance instructor Eduardo Macarat in Yokohama who changed his career to support his family, and Hongkonger Tom Wong who promotes shiitake mushrooms grown in Iwate.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Ishikawa Junya provides trailers with flush toilets to areas hit by natural disasters. He talks to us about sustainable disaster relief, and the importance of networks.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Gojinjo Taiko is a wild, powerful performance by masked drummers. It originated 400 years ago, when villagers disguised themselves as oni (demons) to scare away a warlord's army.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Will Sparks Fly?
programme.desc: A dapper young man sits in a teahouse with his older companion when a young woman catches his eye. From the way they're looking at each other, it's clear that there's something going on between them.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: BOSAI: Be Prepared
programme.desc: Every summer, several typhoons approach Japan and make landfall. By understanding the way they move and the power of their rainstorms, we can learn how to protect ourselves and our possessions.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: We introduce a documentary program exploring Japanese Ig Nobel laureates and the serious aims and stories behind their humorous, thought-provoking research.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 116
programme.desc: Live from Parliament House in Canberra we bring you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. We ask politicians the tough questions and speak with key players and experts on topics making news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 116
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Simple Seafood
programme.desc: It's simply the best as Adam, Hope St Radio Head Chef Ellie Bouhadana and photographer and chef Joel Bennetts make magic with simple seafood.

programme.title: This Place - Mallacoota: Sacred, White, Pipe Clay
programme.desc: At the south of Yuin land, three rivers form a junction: Maramingo Creek, meaning "the place of fish spear", Wallagaraugh River whose meaning has been lost, and the Jinoor (Ginoa) River, meaning "foot" or "pathway".

programme.title: ABC News Regional - Episode 23
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 188
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Melissa Mackay.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 105
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus analysis from 7.30's Political Editor Jacob Greber.

programme.title: Designing A Legacy - Country
programme.desc: In Designing a Legacy, architectural nerd Tim Ross travels the length and breadth of the country seeking an alternate story of Australia; one that shows how great design better connects us to place and to each other.

programme.title: The World - Episode 105
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: Grand Designs Transformations - Belmont and Oatlands
programme.desc: In Geelong Victoria, Luke and Bree restore a Victorian cottage and add on a massive contemporary extension, while in the historic Tasmanian village of Oatlands, Karen and Stu restore a sandstone Georgian cottage.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 134
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: ABC News Regional - Episode 23
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 134
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 93
programme.desc: Kirsten Aiken and The Business team preview tomorrow's interest rate decision from the Reserve Bank. What do the markets and economists expect to see from RBA Governor Michele Bullock's statement? What does it mean for you?

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 105
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus analysis from 7.30's Political Editor Jacob Greber.

programme.title: The World - Episode 105
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 134
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 93
programme.desc: Kirsten Aiken and The Business team preview tomorrow's interest rate decision from the Reserve Bank. What do the markets and economists expect to see from RBA Governor Michele Bullock's statement? What does it mean for you?

programme.title: Designing A Legacy - Country
programme.desc: In Designing a Legacy, architectural nerd Tim Ross travels the length and breadth of the country seeking an alternate story of Australia; one that shows how great design better connects us to place and to each other.

programme.title: Grand Designs Transformations - Belmont and Oatlands
programme.desc: In Geelong Victoria, Luke and Bree restore a Victorian cottage and add on a massive contemporary extension, while in the historic Tasmanian village of Oatlands, Karen and Stu restore a sandstone Georgian cottage.

programme.title: ABC News Regional - Episode 23
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: The World - Episode 105
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 135
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and Emma Rebellato present the latest news, overnight developments and top stories, joined by Catherine Murphy with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 135
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's going on this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 135
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Steak Out
programme.desc: The stakes are high - and tasty! - as acclaimed food writer Lara Lee and social media's top chef Andy Hearnden join Adam for a steak out.

programme.title: Heywire - Rania from Cocos Islands
programme.desc: Heywire winner Rania has bones as brittle as glass. She can't walk around her Cocos Island home, but through her advocacy, she's making the tropical island more accessible.

programme.title: Australian Story - The River (Part 1)
programme.desc: When a Lithuanian rafter became trapped in rapids on the Franklin River, it set in train a perilous 24-hour rescue mission that presented rescuers with a terrible choice. (Part 1 of 2)

programme.title: The Dark Emu Story
programme.desc: A thought-provoking and inspiring documentary that charts the impact of Bruce Pascoe's Dark Emu - the publishing phenomenon that challenged Australia to rethink its history and ignited a debate that continues to rage.

programme.title: This Place - How Looern and the Swan Sisters Gave Us Granite
programme.desc: The Wathaurung people of Victoria share a fascinating creation story with their neighbouring tribal groups. Wathaurung man Barry James Gilson tell us how Looern helped create vast granite formations.

programme.title: Running Dry
programme.desc: The world is running out of water. Climate change, mismanagement and geopolitics are a drying up our reservoirs. The ripple effect is leaving millions struggling - there is hope but we must make every drop count.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 117
programme.desc: After the Reserve Bank deliver their July decision on interest rates, Patricia Karvelas speaks with politicians, economists, key players and guests on what it means for the economy. Plus the day's national and global affairs.

programme.title: Rocky IV: Rocky Vs. Drago
programme.desc: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-six, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Elektra unwittingly takes part in her former teacher's test when she protects a former target and his daughter from "The Hand," a sinister crime syndicate of martial arts fighters.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

programme.title: High Noon
programme.desc: A retired marshal and his new bride learn that a killer whom the marshal sent to jail is coming back to town on the noon train, seeking revenge. Deserted by his friends and former deputies, he faces the killer and his gang alone.

programme.title: 48 Hrs.
programme.desc: A weary cop springs a con out of jail for two days in order to track down a criminal.

programme.title: Another 48 Hrs.
programme.desc: Hammond and Cates reunite to find out who's behind a deadly drug ring that's taken power in San Francisco.

programme.title: In Search of Heat S2
programme.desc: Kevin learns how to make a Thai curry featuring wild ingredients, travels by boat back in time to experience the origin of royal dishes, and goes head to head with the Nam Prik Queen of Lak Praw.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villa’s dark secrets.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mu’s youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Tobie Lolness
programme.desc: Tobie builds a new life for himself. But one of the Tree's inhabitants turns up in the Prairie: Lou Tann, who tells her that her parents are still alive, prisoners in the Crater.

programme.title: Chef Pays
programme.desc: Chef Leila Albert makes a vegetarian pepper and tuna savoury pie.

programme.title: Ca Pousse Au Fenua
programme.desc: The resources of the Polynesian agricultural world are numerous and varied. For some, they are even considered as true treasures. Travel to discover these lands rich in flavors and know-how.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: They are nocturnal and said to dine on blood and transmit myriad diseases. Yet bats, the stealthy shadows that haunt our imaginations, have done nothing to deserve their bad reputation. Violinist Julie Berthollet is about to discover that these harmless little creatures are essential to the regulation of insect populations.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Tour De France : Une Passion FranCaise
programme.desc: Since its creation in 1903, the Tour de France has shaped the French collective memory, establishing itself as one of the country's most unifying sports events. How did it become such an intrinsic part of French life? We look back over 120 years of personal accounts and archive footage.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Les Journees Particulieres by LVMH: perspectives for the craft professions in the world of fashion. The story of sauerkraut, a journey from China to Alsace. Graphic artist Sarah Naud and her sculptures in cement. How to get the biker look. Dgena Mouclier and upcycled menswear fashion.

programme.title: Arlette
programme.desc: Approached by Quebec's prime minister in the hope of bringing a younger look to his government, Arlette Saint-Amour, fashion magazine editor, is appointed minister of culture. Through her audacity and impeccable image management, she tries to make a place for herself in the world of politics.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Marianne, Leon's mother has died. Now he has to move to Montreal to live with Francis, his biological father. Fortunately his grandfather Bernard will be at his side during this painful ordeal.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Leon visits his new secondary school to finalise his admission with the headmaster. Meanwhile Francis realises that he'll have to make some changes in the house to make life easier for Leon.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: It's Leon's first day at school! His French teacher is convinced he'll be an asset for the class. Leon meets Florence, a pupil suffering from cystic fibrosis.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Ricardo has to choose a member of his family who inspires him for a French project, which leads him to question his mother about his biological father. Leon learns a little more about the relationship between his parents.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: They are nocturnal and said to dine on blood and transmit myriad diseases. Yet bats, the stealthy shadows that haunt our imaginations, have done nothing to deserve their bad reputation. Violinist Julie Berthollet is about to discover that these harmless little creatures are essential to the regulation of insect populations.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Encounter with Julien des Monstiers both in his studio at the Château de Chambord and at a magisterial solo exhibition. Dragons and other extraordinary creatures populate a world beyond contemporary conventions.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: De Rosine a Claude Jeanne
programme.desc: Claudia Lebeuf arrived in Toronto fifty years ago, to marry an Egyptian widower. Later, when selling the family property, La Reille, in Carcassonne, she discovered a series of letters between her ancestors. For Claudia it's the start of a quest for identity, in the footsteps of her great-grandmother Rosine.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: A small country that suffers from its geographical proximity to Azerbaijan and Turkey: Armenia. In September 2023, the situation in Nagorno-Karabakh took a dramatic turn with the forced exile of its Armenian population, against the background of Russian disengagement and a certain Western indifference.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut
programme.desc: Water is closely linked to the mountain. It shapes and sculpts its landscapes for millennia, but is also a vital resource for its fauna and flora. Laurent Guillaume goes to Corsica with Guillaume Nery, world champion of apnea, to learn more about this complex element.

programme.title: Ca Pousse Au Fenua
programme.desc: The resources of the Polynesian agricultural world are numerous and varied. For some, they are even considered as true treasures. Travel to discover these lands rich in flavors and know-how.

programme.title: Partis Rouler
programme.desc: Direction Bromont, which has built an undeniable reputation! This paradise for cyclists is protected by a high-spirited community of mountain biking enthusiasts.

programme.title: Abers Road
programme.desc: From Trinite-sur-Mer in Carnac with a detour to Plouharnel, Gaetan Roussel discovers the musical universe of Charles Souchon, alias 'Ours'. Second son of the famous French singer Alain Souchon, like other singers (Arthur H and -M-) he has chosen to make a career for himself without emphasising his surname.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Les Saisons De Pique-Assiette
programme.desc: On the menu: lamb's lettuce salad with confit Jerusalem artichokes and oven-roasted cauliflower with vanilla sauce. Discovery of the day: organic maple syrup and its amazing by-products...

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Partis Rouler
programme.desc: Direction Bromont, which has built an undeniable reputation! This paradise for cyclists is protected by a high-spirited community of mountain biking enthusiasts.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut
programme.desc: Water is closely linked to the mountain. It shapes and sculpts its landscapes for millennia, but is also a vital resource for its fauna and flora. Laurent Guillaume goes to Corsica with Guillaume Nery, world champion of apnea, to learn more about this complex element.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Astig
programme.desc: Two police informants assume tough personas to con money from small-time criminals. But all their wise-cracking pretense traps them to be part of a crime boss's major operations.

programme.title: Blue Jeans ep 9
programme.desc: BLUE JEANS is a youth-oriented drama that follows the intersecting and intertwining lives of 6 present-day Filipino working students in the university belt.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 8
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 45
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 30
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: For the Love ep 1
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 5
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 2
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
